sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUFFRAGAN, an appellation given to simple biſhops with regard to archbiſhops, on whom they depend, and to whom appeals lie from the biſliops courts.
Suffragan is likewiſe the appellation given to a biſhop, who is occaſionally appointed to reſide in a town or village, and aſſiſt the dioceſan.
